title: Looking for DuoQ Partner
body: Hello everyone. My Summoner name is SenpaiLion. I am looking for a DuoQ support partner! I would preferably want them to have skype. I am a passive-aggressive {{champion:67}} player, and can adapt pretty fast to the situation. I am fine with any support, but prefer anyone who is better early game. I also can play other roles, and my sub role would be Jungle. I am in Bronze.

replies.body: I can play all roles but would be happy to support you and I know alot of the damage outputs on botlane champions I just sent you a friend request add me if interested.
